description:
A Note From Dink
Hey Troops...our famed fuckers Adam and Brad from SGT Fuck 'Em are back at it again in this 4 man anal tag team. We've also initiated two new recruits ... Scott (a Navy boy that I met at Union Station but was not able to get in the action of Chicago Squids. He called a couple of days after the throwdown with Mike Lowry and his gang of Navy buddies so I took Scott on a trip with me to visit Adam and Brad. To my surprise, our boy Brad was anticipating my arrival and had conveniently invited over his supposedly straight buddy Antonio. What a hot little Hispanic. We soon find that Antonio and Scott are quite possibly two of the hungriest bottoms alive. But even still ... Adam and Brad leave the scene having done the boys in. Digitally shot, edited and mastered this tape is a must have for your Active Duty collection.
title: Adam, Antonio, Brad & Scott
